i18n.key: name of the task, with the ID of the document in question between parentheses
the user to whom the task is associated. Only that user can run it.
Work item related to the task.
This notification is sent to the task's owner after it has been created.
This notification is sent to the task's owner after its execution has finished.
This notification is sent to the task's owner after it has been cancelled.
Description of the task to carry out.
Comment related to the task to carry out explaining the choice that has been made.
